body_html: I looked into this issue, and as far as I can tell, the issue comes from this line in the class Optimizer() implementation, and not the clip_by_value op. Also none of the optimizers override the _valid_dtypes() method. I don't have background information as to why the dtypes did not include float64. Can one of the admins comment on this?
body_text: I looked into this issue, and as far as I can tell, the issue comes from this line in the class Optimizer() implementation, and not the clip_by_value op. Also none of the optimizers override the _valid_dtypes() method. I don't have background information as to why the dtypes did not include float64. Can one of the admins comment on this?
body: I looked into this issue, and as far as I can tell, the issue comes from [this line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/optimizer.py#L379) in the `class Optimizer()` implementation, and not the `clip_by_value` op. Also none of the optimizers override the `_valid_dtypes()` method. I don't have background information as to why the dtypes did not include float64. Can one of the admins comment on this?
